scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/css dist/js && npm run optimize-images && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-js: uglifyjs js/gallery.js js/totop.js js/fancybox-init.js js/duoshuo.js js/mathjax-config.js -o dist/js/bundle.min.js
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run build && echo 'Build completed successfully'
scripts.security-report: echo 'See security-audit.md for latest security findings'
scripts.deploy-check: npm run test && npm run security-check
